instructions:
This character sheet is designed for use with the Dragonslayer Classic Fantasy Role-Playing Game by Greg Gillespie.

Notes
• This sheet includes one-click roll buttons for attacks, saving throws, thief skills, and class abilities. Rolls automatically calculate total to-hit, damage, and success or failure.

• Ability score modifiers are automatically calculated when ability scores are entered. Saving throws are calculated when class and level are entered.

• The sheet features a toggle that switches between the standard player-character sheet and a monster-style stat block.

• This is the official Dragonslayer Classic Fantasy RPG Roll20 sheet and will be compatible with future compendia.
